subject: Fancy a family meal with a difference this long weekend?
body:
This Easter and Ramadan, surprise your loved ones with a meal
made from an ALDI Surprise Bag.

A family meal with a difference

With Easter and Ramadan coinciding this year, families across
the country will gather to eat together and enjoy each other's
company. Do it with a difference by saving food from going to
waste from your local ALDI for less than half of the initial
price.

In your ALDI Surprise Bag, you will receive a selection of
grocery items that may include fruit, veg, meat*, fish, dairy,
cakes, pastries and snacks - perfect for building out a brunch,
lunch, dinner, sehri or iftar.

An extra two days of the weekend means an extra two days to get
creative and flex your muscles as a home chef. Have your most
planet-friendly Easter and Ramadan yet while spending time with
those you love.

subject: Experience It: A Life-Changing Whole Person Education – Body, Mind, and Spirit
body:
Hi,

We hope you are doing well!

If you believe education is powerful enough to change life, we want to personally invite you and your family to one of our virtual events that is tailored for you: Experience It:  A Life-Changing Whole Person Education – Body, Mind, and Spirit, so you can experience ORU for yourself!


During this event, we will discuss on:

Redefinition of successful and purposeful education
Opportunities and access that are available for you to experience quality education
Connections with professors who are professional and experienced but also mentors and role models to students
College life experience with current students who are from similar backgrounds and are thriving in their growth
Questions and answers
And more!


Don't miss out on the chance to get a taste of the incredible journey ahead.

Everyone is worthy of receiving a quality education.
Dreams are valuable and achievable because:

Your concerns are heard.
Your concerns are covered.
Your next steps are helped.
You are not alone.


Additional bonus: Meeting interpretation in your native language is possible!!

Join us on April 18 at 7:00 am (GMT-5)  to start envisioning a life-changing college for yourself or your loved ones!

You can register for this event HERE.

See you then!



Yan Wen,
International Admissions Representative
International Student Relations

7777 S. Lewis Ave., Tulsa, OK 74171
o: 918.495.6778
ywen@oru.edu | oru.edu
intladmissions@oru.edu

No bulk or third party entries accepted. Anyone entering more than once including but not limited to: using multiple handsets; multiple identities; or computerised (automated) system will be disqualified from the prize draw. By entering the prize draw, you agree to be bound by its terms and conditions. No purchase necessary. Responsibility will not be accepted for the loss, delay or corruption of any data in transit, or in the incomplete nature of any entries to the prize draw. A Boots employee will randomly select the winner using a computer-generated method after 9 April 2024. The winners will be notified via email by the 12 April 2024 and must respond by 19 April 2024. The prize draw will be conducted in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. If an entry is drawn that does not comply with these Terms and Conditions, it shall be disqualified and will not be awarded a prize. The Promoter reserves the right to select a new winner in the same manner. This process will be followed until an eligible and responsive prize winner is selected. The winners will be contacted by a representative at Boots. Please make sure your email address is on your boots.com account. If you object to your surname and county being made available on request in the event of winning, you must notify the Promoter by contacting boots.customercare_team@boots.co.uk. Your details can still be made available to the Advertising Standards Authority, should it request this information, to assess compliance with the CAP Code. Boots will collect your name and email address for the purposes of the Boots Beauty Box Competition. Your personal data will be stored until 9 April 2025 unless we are required to hold it for longer for legal reasons. By entering the competition, you consent to your data being shared with teams internally, for the processing of your entry. Boots will never sell your personal data and keeping it safe is our top priority. For more information about who we may share your data with, how Boots processes your data and how to amend or remove your data, please see our privacy policy; or contact boots.customercare_team@boots.co.uk.

subject: Hop to it! Easter treats are here 🐰
body:
Join us in the tea rooms this bank holiday weekend for delicious Easter treats

View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/huffkins/hop-to-it-easter-weekend?e=ccf1fa783c)
https://huffkins.com/?utm_source=Huffkins+Bakery+Community&utm_campaign=27f90feaf9-easter-bank-holiday&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_-27f90feaf9-%5BLIST_EMAIL_ID%5D&goal=0_9719d7aca5-27f90feaf9-358014870&mc_cid=27f90feaf9&mc_eid=UNIQID

** Easter is hopping closer!
------------------------------------------------------------


** Join us in the tea rooms this bank holiday weekend
------------------------------------------------------------

Our bakers have handcrafted a range of treats for the occasion, perfect for enjoying in our cosy tearooms.

Celebrate Easter with fluffy hot cross buns bursting with juicy currants, or savour our pastel-coloured cupcakes adorned with delightful chocolate eggs. We also have adorable gingerbread bunnies, ideal for gifting, and decadent Easter brownies for those who crave a rich chocolate indulgence.

To avoid disappointment we recommend that you make a reservation.

BOOK A TABLE (https://huffkins.com/pages/cotswolds-afternoon-tea-reservations?utm_source=Huffkins+Bakery+Community&utm_campaign=27f90feaf9-easter-bank-holiday&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_-27f90feaf9-%5BLIST_EMAIL_ID%5D&goal=0_9719d7aca5-27f90feaf9-358014870&mc_cid=27f90feaf9&mc_eid=UNIQID)
